Implementation of the IGeometryObject interface. See Interfaces\Geometry.h and Interfaces\System.h for a definition of the class and its functions.

System::Types::BitMask GeometryObject::GetDesiredSystemChanges ( void   )  [protected, virtual]

Returns a bit mask of System Changes that this system wants to receive changes for. Used to inform the change control manager if this system's object should be informed of the change.

Returns:
A System::Changes::BitMask.

Implements ISystemObject.
